US: [[The 1994 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]]

column1: The '''''J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1995''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[HarperCollins]] on [[11 July]] [[1994]]. It features art by [[John Howe]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]'', ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.

column2: Gandalf Comes to the Guarded City]]"

* September - "[[:File:John Howe - Ulmo, Lord of the Waters.jpg
